name: Sidney Poitier Movies Online Quiz | People Themed | 10 Questions

questions.text: Poitier had a role as a youngster in 'The Blackboard Jungle'. Who was the star of the movie?
Poitier had a starring role in 'In The Heat of The Night'. Where did the story take place?
questions.explanation:
Mississippi.

	Sparta, Miss. Great job by Steiger.

questions.text: Poitier had a different kind of role in 'To Sir, With Love'. Who sang the title song?
Who co-starred with Poitier in 'Edge of the City'?
questions.explanation:
John Cassavetes.

	Early in Poitier's career. Not too bad.

questions.text: In 'Lilies of the Field', Poitier works with what group of people?
Poitier had a role in 'Cry, The Beloved Country'. Who wrote the play?
Poitier had a good role in 'Guess Who's Coming to Dinner' with Tracy and Hepburn. Who was the director?
questions.explanation:
Stanley Kramer.

	Kramer did many of the fine movies that Tracy made late in his career.

questions.text: Who co-starred with Poitier in 'The Defiant Ones'?
questions.explanation:
Tony Curtis.

	Early tale of race relationships.

questions.text: Which of these movies starred Sidney Poitier?
questions.explanation:
'For Love of Ivy'.

	Not one of his biggest hits. 'Iron' was an Alan Ladd western about Jim Bowie. 'Heat' starred Glenn Ford as a cop. 'Outsider' was a Tony Curtis fact-based story about an Indian soldier at Iwo Jima in WW II.
